flowers.name: Mugunghwa
flowers.meaning: Symbolizes immortality and perseverance. The national flower of South Korea.
flowers.description: Beautiful red rose symbolizing immortality and perseverance.

flowers.name: Begonia
flowers.meaning: Represents gratitude and harmony. Often given to express appreciation.
flowers.description: Elegant white lily representing gratitude and harmony.

flowers.name: Chrysanthemum
flowers.meaning: Symbolizes longevity and uprightness. A popular motif in traditional Korean art.
flowers.description: Elegant white lily symbolizing longevity and uprightness.

flowers.name: Orchid
flowers.meaning: Represents refinement, friendship, and noble character. Associated with elegance.
flowers.description: Elegant white lily representing refinement, friendship, and noble character.

flowers.name: Apricot Blossom
flowers.meaning: Symbolizes purity and endurance. Used in Korean poetry and art.
flowers.description: Elegant white lily symbolizing purity and endurance.

flowers.name: Dahlia
flowers.meaning: Represents inner strength and elegance. Known for its vibrant and diverse colors.
flowers.description: Elegant white lily symbolizing inner strength and elegance.

flowers.name: Plum Blossom
flowers.meaning: Represents resilience and beauty through adversity. Associated with spring.
flowers.description: Elegant white lily symbolizing resilience and beauty through adversity.

flowers.name: Azalea
flowers.meaning: Symbolizes femininity and softness. Used to express admiration.
flowers.description: Elegant Azalea symbolizing femininity and softness.

flowers.name: Camellia
flowers.meaning: Represents admiration and perfection. Associated with waiting with faith.
flowers.description: Elegant Camellia symbolizing admiration and perfection.

flowers.name: Peach Blossom
flowers.meaning: Symbolizes longevity and happiness. Used in celebrations and festivals.
flowers.description: Elegant Peach Blossom symbolizing longevity and happiness.

flowers.name: Tulip
flowers.meaning: Represents a declaration of love. Different colors convey specific emotions.
flowers.description: Elegant Tulip symbolizing a declaration of love.

flowers.name: Rose
flowers.meaning: Symbolizes love, passion, and beauty. Different colors convey different sentiments.
flowers.description: Elegant Rose symbolizing love, passion, and beauty.

flowers.name: Lily
flowers.meaning: Represents purity and virtue. Associated with motherhood and renewal.
flowers.description: Elegant Lily symbolizing purity and virtue.

flowers.name: Sunflower
flowers.meaning: Symbolizes adoration and loyalty. Represents warmth and positivity.
flowers.description: Elegant Sunflower symbolizing adoration and loyalty.

flowers.name: Daisy
flowers.meaning: Represents innocence and purity. Often associated with new beginnings.
flowers.description: Elegant Daisy symbolizing innocence and purity.

flowers.name: Daffodil
flowers.meaning: Symbolizes rebirth and new beginnings. Represents the arrival of spring.
flowers.description: Elegant Daffodil symbolizing rebirth and new beginnings.

flowers.name: Peony
flowers.meaning: Represents prosperity, honor, and compassion. Associated with wealth and good fortune.
flowers.description: Elegant Peony symbolizing prosperity, honor, and compassion.

flowers.name: Daisy Delight
flowers.meaning: Represents cheerfulness and innocence. Often associated with simplicity and purity.
flowers.description: Charming Daisy representing cheerfulness and innocence.

flowers.name: Vibrant Tulip
flowers.meaning: Symbolizes passion and elegance. Different colors convey specific emotions.
flowers.description: Elegant Tulip symbolizing passion and elegance.

flowers.name: Harmony Orchid
flowers.meaning: Represents unity and refinement. Associated with elegance and friendship.
flowers.description: Exquisite Orchid symbolizing unity and refinement.

flowers.name: Radiant Sunflower
flowers.meaning: Symbolizes positivity and joy. Represents adoration and loyalty.
flowers.description: Vibrant Sunflower radiating positivity and joy.

flowers.name: Serene Lily
flowers.meaning: Represents tranquility and peace. Associated with purity and renewal.
flowers.description: Graceful Lily symbolizing tranquility and peace.

flowers.name: Enchanting Rose
flowers.meaning: Symbolizes enchantment and mystery. Different colors convey diverse sentiments.
flowers.description: Captivating Rose symbolizing enchantment and mystery.

flowers.name: Eternal Chrysanthemum
flowers.meaning: Represents everlasting beauty and vitality. A symbol of honor and positive energy.
flowers.description: Timeless Chrysanthemum symbolizing everlasting beauty and vitality.

flowers.name: Vivid Violet
flowers.meaning: Symbolizes enchantment and mystery. Associated with imagination and creativity.
flowers.description: Colorful Violet symbolizing enchantment and mystery, perfect for expressing imagination and creativity.
